amendatorysection.catchline: Poor relief; duty of county board.
amendatorysection.para: In all counties the care of the poor shall be under the charge of the county board as provided by law.

annotation.para: In counties under township organization, support of poor devolves upon townships. Custer Township v. Board of Supervisors of Antelope County, 103 Neb. 128, 170 N.W. 600 (1919).
